context: Mid-sized university facing declining enrollment and need for modernization, considering major investment in digital learning platform to enhance student experience and operational efficiency

request.purpose: Implementation of comprehensive digital learning platform including LMS upgrade, adaptive learning tools, and analytics dashboard
request.justification: Competitive pressure from online education providers, declining traditional enrollment, need for personalized learning experiences

activities: Market research on digital learning platforms
decision_process.outcome: Positive feasibility with projected 25% enrollment increase
Strong faculty support with concerns about training requirements
Three finalist vendors selected with detailed proposals

business_impact.expected_outcome: Increased enrollment by 25%, improved student retention by 15%, enhanced learning outcomes

lessons_learned: Early faculty engagement critical for technology adoption, comprehensive training program essential, phased rollout reduces implementation risk
